getHelpPanelComponents.getHelpPanelHints:
**Functional Purpose**: Informative paragraph about the purpose and judicious use of hints.
**UI Location**: Get Help Panel → Hints and Tips section
**When Users See This**: When the 'Hints and Tips' section is expanded or visible.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Stuck? These hints will give you nudges to the right direction to get you unblocked. Use them wisely though - remember that wrestling with a problem is where the learning occurs!"

**Functional Purpose**: Instruction for interacting with hint sections.
**UI Location**: Get Help Panel → Hints and Tips section
**When Users See This**: When the 'Hints and Tips' section is expanded or visible.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Click a heading to expand the hints:"

**Functional Purpose**: Heading for general hints.
**UI Location**: Get Help Panel → Hints and Tips section → General hints
**When Users See This**: When general hints are displayed within the 'Hints and Tips' section.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "General"
getHelpPanelComponents.getHelpPanelCommu:
**Functional Purpose**: Encouragement for users to seek community help.
**UI Location**: Get Help Panel → Community Help section
**When Users See This**: When the 'Community Help' section is expanded or visible.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Don't struggle on alone! Our community is always here to help."

**Functional Purpose**: Explains when users can seek help from the community via Discord or Forum.
**UI Location**: Get Help Panel → Community Help section
**When Users See This**: When the 'Community Help' section is expanded or visible.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Although you can't submit a mentoring requests until you get the tests passing, you can ask for help on Discord or our Forum. Use the links below to get started:"

**Functional Purpose**: Describes the Discord community help opportunity.
**UI Location**: Get Help Panel → Community Help section → Discord link
**When Users See This**: When the 'Community Help' section is expanded or visible.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Get real time help in the #get-help channel on our Discord server."

**Functional Purpose**: Describes the Forum community help opportunity.
**UI Location**: Get Help Panel → Community Help section → Forum link
**When Users See This**: When the 'Community Help' section is expanded or visible.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Dig deeper into topics and ideas on our forum."
